juzs.text: Khwam ceriysukh cng mi dæ phra phu sung xanac xyu nı phrahatth khxng phraxngkh læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng xanuphaph henux thuksingthukxyang
phra phuthrng hı mi khwam tay læa hı mi khwam pen pheux ca thdsxb phwk cea wa phu dı bang nı hmu phwk cea thi mi phl ngan di ying læa phraxngkh pen phuthrng xanac phuthrng hıxphay semx

phra phuthrng srang chan fa thang ced pen chan «cea ca mi hen tæ xyang dı nı khwam mi di sadswn nı kar srang khxng phra phuthrng kruna prani dangnan cea cng han klab ma mxng du si cea hen rxyraw hrux chxng how bang him
læw cng han klab ma mxng xik pen khrang thi sxng sayta nan k ca klab mayang cea dwy kar yxm cann læa nı sphaph thi laheiy
læa doy nænxn rea di pradab thxngfa khxng lok ni dwy dwngdaw pen sæng prathip læa rea di thahı man pen xawuth li chay txn læa rea di teriym kar lngthosʹ dwy fi xan rxn ræng sahrab phwk man
læa sahrab brrda phu ptiseth sraththa tx phracea khxng phwk khea nan khux kar lngthosʹ hæng nrk yahannam læa man pen thang klab thi chawcha ying
meux phwk khea thuk yon lng pi nı nrk phwk khea ca diyin seiyng khxng man khrwykhrang khna thi man ka lang k deuxn phlan
man thæb ca rabeid xxk pi pheraa khwam kheiydkhæn thuk khrang thi phwk hnung thuk yon lng pi nı man yam fea nrk ca tham phwk khea wa midi mi phu takteuxn mayang phwk cea dxk hrux
phwk khea klaw wa mi di mi phu takteuxn mayang rea tæ phwk rea di ptiseth læa rea klaw xik wa xallxhˌ midi thrng prathan sing dı lng ma phwk than tanghak thi xyu nı kar hlng phid xyang mak
læa phwk khea klaw xik wa hak phwk rea fang læa chı stipayya khırkhrwy phwk rea k ca midi ma xyu pen chaw nrk xyang ni dxk
phwk khea yxm sarphaph nı khwam phid khxng phwk khea tæ man hang kil pi seiy læw sahrab chaw nrk
thæcring brrda phu yakerng tx phracea khxng phwk khea doy thang lab sahrab phwk khea ca di rab kar xphaythosʹ læa rangwal xan hıy hlwng
Læa phwk cea cng pidbang kha phud khxng phwk cea hrux peidphey man ktam thæcring phraxngkh thrng rxbru sing thi xyu nı thrwngxk
phra phuthrng srang ca mi thrng rxbru dxk hrux? Phraxngkh khux phuthrng rxbru xyang thithwn phuthrng trahnak ying

phraxngkh khux phuthrng tha phændin ni hı rabreiyb sahrab phwk cea dangnan cng saycr pi tam khxbkhet khxng man læa cng briphokh cak paccay yangchiph khxng phraxngkh læa yang phraxngkh theanan kar fun khunchiph
phwk cea ca plxdphay la hrux cak kar thi phraxngkh thrng sthity xyu n fak fa ca hı phændin sub phwk cea læw khna nan man ca hwanhiw
hrux wa phwk cea ca plxdphay cak kar thi phra phuthrng sthity xyu n fak fa ca thrng sng lm hxb kxn krwd hı krahna mayang phwk cea læw phwk cea ca di ru wakar takteuxn khxng kha pen chen dı
læa doy nænxn brrda (hmu chn) kxn hna phwk khea di ptiseth ma kxn læw dangnan kar ptiseth kha teuxn khxng kha mi phl pen xyangri

phwk khea midi mxng pi du nk thi (bin) xyu beuxngbn phwk khea dxk hrux? Man kaw pik læa hub pik (khxng man) mimi phu dı ca pi dung man wi di nxkcak phra phuthrng kruna prani thæcring phraxngkh thrng mxng hen thuk sing xyang
hrux phu dı lea sung khea pen phlphrrkh khxng phwk cea thi ca chwyhelux phwk cea xun cak phra phuthrng kruna prani? Phwk ptiseth sraththa nan michı xun dı ley nxkcak nı kar hlxklwng theanan
hrux phu dı lea sung khea ca hı paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea hak phraxngkh thrng rangab paccay yangchiph khxng phraxngkh wi tæwa phwk cea dux ran xyu nı khwam hying yaso læa ha kil cak khwam cring
phu thi dein khwa khma bn bıhna khxng khea ca pen phu thi xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng kwa hrux wa phu thi dein taw trng xyu bn næwthang thi theiyngtrng
cng klaw theid muhammad phraxngkh khux phuthrng bangkeid phwk cea ca khxbkhun
cng klaw theid muhammad phraxngkh pen phuthrng phær phea phanth khxng phwk cea nı phændin læa phwk cea ca thuk rwbrwm hı klab pi ha phraxngkh
Læa phwk khea klaw wa meux dı lea sayya ni ca keid khun hak phwk than pen phu saty cring
cng klaw theid muhammad khwam ru nı reuxng nan xyu thi xallxhˌ khwam cring chan pen pheiyng phu takteuxn xan cæmcæng theanan
tx meux phwk khea hen man (kar lngthosʹ) kıl khea ma læw bıhna khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa k ca hmnhmxng læa ca miseiyng klaw wa ni khux sing thi phwk cea rxngkhx (nı lok dun ya)

cng klaw theid muhammad phwk than ca bxk chan si wa ha kxallxhˌ ca thrng thalay chan læa phu thi xyu rwm kab chan hrux ca thrng metta kæ phwk rea dangnan phu dı lea ca chwy phwk ptiseth sraththa hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd
cng klaw theid muhammad phraxngkh khux phra phuthrng kruna prani rea sraththa tx phraxngkh læw rea khxm xb hmay dæ phraxngkh læw ca di ru wa khır phu dı xyu nı kar hlng phid xan chad cæng
cng klaw theid muhammad phwk than cng bxk chan si wa hak hælng na khxng phwk than heuxdhæng lng dangnan phu dı lea ca na na thi thwm than ma hı phwk than
nun khx saban dwy pakka læa sing thi phwk khea khid kheiyn
dwy khwam pordpran hæng phracea khxng cea cea midi pen phu seiy sti
læa thæcring sahrab cea nan mi rangwal xyang mi khad say
læa thæcring cea nan xyu bn khunthrrm xan ying hıy
læw cea ca di hen læa phwk khea k ca di hen
wa phu dı nı hmu phwk cea khux phu wikl ci rit
thæcring phracea khxng cea nan phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi hlng cak thang khxng phraxngkh læa phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng
dangnan cea xya di ptibati tam brrda phu ptiseth ley
phwk khea khır thi ca hen wa hak cea xxnkhx læw phwk khea k ca xxnkhx tam
læa cea xya ptibati tam thuk khn thi pen nak saban thi tacha
phu nintha trawen sıray phu xun
phu khadkhwang kar thakhwam di phu xthrrm tharay baphna
pen khn hyabkhay lew thram ying kwa nan yang pen khn tacha pælkplxm
Doy thuxwa khea pen phu mi thraphysin læa mi butr hlan mak
meux xa yat (xalkurxan) thanghlay khxng rea thuk sathyay kæ khea khea klaw wa pen niyay helwhil smay kxn
rea ca ti tra khea bn play cmuk
thæcring rea di thdsxb phwk khea dang chen thi rea di thdsxb brrda ceakhxng swn meux phwk khea saban wa ca kebkeiyw phl khxng man nı yam rung
læa phwk khea midi klaw kha wa “xin cha xallxhˌ”
dangnan kar lngthosʹ cak phracea khxng cea kdi ma thalay swn nan khna thi phwk khea kalang nxn hlab xyu
khran nı txn chea man k klay pen chen thuk tad xyang rabreiyb
dangnan phwk khea cung ku takon hı tun tæ cheatru
cng kheapi nı swn khxng phwk than nı txn cheatru theid hak phwk than txngkar ca keb phl mi
læw phwk khea pha kan xxk pi læw phwk khea phud krasib sung kanlæakan xyang bea «
wa wan ni xya di hı khn yakcn khadsn sak khn hnung kheapi ha phwk than nı swn nan
læa phwk khea kdi xxk pi tæ chea tangcı wa ca keb phl mi hı hmd kxn thi yakcn ca kheapi nı swn
khran meux phwk khea hen swn (xyu nı sphaph thi thuk thalay) phwk khea k klaw khun wa thæcring phwk rea hlng thang seiy læw
(bang khn klaw wa) pela dxk phwk rea thuk hwngham siththi seiy læw
khn thi mi stipayya khn hnung nı hmu phwk khea klaw wa chan midi bxk phwk than dxk hrux wa tha mi phwk than cung mi klaw sdudi dæ xallxhˌ
phwk khea cung klaw wa mha brisuththi hæng phracea khxng rea thæcring rea nan pen phu xthrrm
læw bang khnnı hmu phwk khea k han pi txwa sung kan læwkan
phwk khea klaw wakhwam hayna prasb kæ rea læw pheraa rea pen phu lameid fafun
bangthi phracea khxng rea ca thrng peliynpælng sing thi di kwa hı kæ rea thæcring rea hwang nı khwam xphay tx phracea khxng rea
chen nan hæla kar lngthosʹ læa nænxn kar lngthosʹ nı prlok nan ying hıy nak hak phwk khea lwngru
thæcring sahrab brrda phu yakerng n thi phracea khxng phwk khea nan khux swn swrrkh hlakhlay hæng brm sukh
Dangnan ca hı rea ptibati kæ brrda phu nxbnxm semuxn kab rea ptibati kæ brrda phu kratha phidk ra nan hrux
keid xari khun dæ phwk cea? Thami phwk cea cung tadsin chen nan
hrux wathi phwk cea mi khamphir wi sahrab xan
sung nı khamphir nan mi sing sahrab phwk cea thi phwk cea ca leuxk xea di
hrux wa phwk cea sayya phukphan kab rea cnkrathang thung wan ki ya mahˌ wa thæcring sahrab phwk cea nan ca di tam thi phwk cea tadsin xea wi
muhammad cng tham phwk khea du wa khn dı nı hmu phwk khea ca pen hawhna nı kar tadsin reuxng nan
hrux wa phwk khea mi hunswn kab xallxhˌ k cng hı phwk khea na hunswn hela nan khxng phwk khea ma tha hak phwk khea saty cring

wan thi na khæng ca thuk leik khun (nı wan ki ya mahˌ phracea ca ma tadsin khdi hnakhæng khxng phraxngkh ca thuk leik khun) læa phwk khea ca thuk reiyk hı ma suyu d tæ phwk khea mi samarth ca suyu d di
sayta khxng phwk khea ca lahxy khwam tatxy ca pkkhlum phwk khea læa nænxn phwk khea khey thuk reiyk hı ma suyu d læw khna thi phwk khea yang xyu nı sphaph thi plxdphay di
dangnan cng plxy hı kha theid sahrab phu thi pti se th tx xalkurxan rea ca na phwk khea lng su (kar lngthosʹ) thi la khan doythi phwk khea miru
læa kha ca prawing wela hı kæ phwk khea thæcring xubay khxng kha nan khængræng nak
hrux wa cea di khx kha txbthæn cak phwk khea dangnan phwk khea cung bæk phara hnak pheraa mi hni
hrux wa phwk khea ru nı sing renlab læw phwk khea k banthuk xea wi
dangnan cea (muhammad) cng xdthn tx pi theid tx baycha khxng phracea khxng cea læa xya pen dang chen ceakhxng pla (na bi yu nus) khna thi khea wingwxn khea xyu nı sphaph thi rathm thukkh
hak michı pheraa khwam metta cak phracea khxng khea mi mayang khea læw khea khng thuk hewiyng pi yang thi long teiyn læa khea ca thuk tahni dwy
tæ phracea khxng khea di thrng khadleuxk khea læa thrng thahı khea xyu nı hmu phu kratha khwam di
Læa brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nan thæb ca thahı sayta khxng phwk khea cxng khemng pi yang cea meux phwk khea di yin xal ku rxa nph wk khea k klaw wa thæcring khea pen khn ba næ «
tæ xalkurxan nan michı xun dı nxkcak pen khx takteuxn kæ prachachati thanghmd
sing thi ca keid khun xyang nænxn (wan ki ya mahˌ)
sing thi ca keid khun xyang nænxn nan khux xari
læa xan dı lea thahı cea ru di wa sing thi ca keid khun xyang nænxn nan khux xari
phwk sa mud læa phwk xad di pti se th wan ki ya mahˌ
phwk sa mud thuk thalay dwy seiyng ka pnath thi na klaw
swn phwk xad thuk thalay dwy lm phayu thi hnaw henb læa seiyng dang kxng
phraxngkh thrng hıxphay nan keid khun kæ phwk khea ced khun kab pæd wan tx neuxng kan læw cea ca hen hmu chn nan nxn tay xyu chen nan prahnung tn xinthphlam thi klang lm raneranad
læw cea hen xari bang hlnghelux sahrab phwk khea
fir xea nˌ læa phwk kxn hna khea læa phwk muxˌ ta fik at (meuxng khxng phwk lut sung thuk phlikphændin) di krathakhwamphid
phwk khea di fafun tx rx sul hæng phracea khxng phwk khea dangnan phraxngkh cung thrng lngthosʹ phwk khea xyang hnak
meux na thwm sung khun thæcring rea di brrthuk phwk cea wi nı reux khxng nuhˌ
pheux rea cak di thahı man pen kheruxng teuxnsti kæ phwk cea læa hu thi saheniyk ca di cdca man wi xyang mænya
khran meux seiyng pea khrang ræk thuk pea khun doy sangkh (pen sayyan cæng hı thrab thung wan ki ya mahˌ)
phændin læa theuxkkhea ca thuk yk khun læw man thang sxng ca thuk krathæk kan tæk kracay pen phuyphng
nı wan nan wan ki ya mahˌ k ca keid khun
læa chan fa k ca yæk xxk læw man k ca xxn kalang lng xyang mi pen rabeiyb nı wan nan
læa ma lak k ca prakt xyu bn weha læa (ma la xik ahˌ) canwn pæd than ca thun banglangk hæng phracea khxng cea wi beuxngbn phwk khea nı wan nan
wan nan phwk cea ca thuk na ma xyu txhna phraxngkh mimi khwam lab xan dı ca thuk pidbang kæ phwk cea
Swn phu thi banthuk khxng khea thuk na ma yun hı thang beuxng khwa khxng khea khea ca klaw wa ma xan banthuk khxng chan si
khwam cring chan nuk thideiyw wa chan ca di phb baychi khxng chan
læw khea ca mi khwam pen xyu xyang sukh saray
nı swn swrrkh xan sungsng
kar ded phl mi khxng man xyu khæ xeuxm mux
phwk cea cng kin cng dum xyang kesʹm saray pheraa sing thi phwk cea di ptibati wi nı wan wela thi di phan ma
swn phu thi banthuk khxng khea thuk na ma yun hı thang beuxng say khxng khea khea ca klaw wa chan phawna thi ca mi hı banthuk khxng chan thuk na ma yun
læa miru seiy ley wa baychi khxng chan ca pen chen dı
xo hakwakhwam tay di keid khun seiy k ca di
thraphysmbati khxng chan mi di khumkan kæ chan ley
xanac khxng chan kdi suy sin pi cak chan læw
(ca mi kha baycha kæ ma la xik ahˌ wa) cng na khea pi læw ca trwn seiy
læw yon khea khea kxng fi nrk
læw lam so khea sung khwam yaw khxng man ced sib sxk
thæcring khea midi sraththa tx xallxhˌ phu ying hıy
læa khea midi sngserim hı xahar kæ khn khadsn
dangnan wan ni khea ca mimi mitr snith n thi ni
læa mimi xahar xyang dı nxkcak na hnxng thi hil ma cak phæl khxng chaw nrk
mimi phu dı kin man nxkcak brrda phu krathakhwamphid
pela ley kha khx saban tx sing thi phwk cea mxng hen
læa sing thi phwk cea mxng mi hen
thæ cring xal kru xan nan khux kha klaw khxng rx sul phuthrng keiyrti
læa michı kha klaw khxng nak kwi swn nxy theanan thi phwk cea sraththa
læa michı kha klaw khxng nak phyakrn swn nxy theanan thi phwk cea khırkhrwy
penkar prathan ma cak phracea hæng sakl lok
læa hak khea (muhammad) seksrr klaw kha thec bang kha kæ rea læw
rea k ca cab khea dwy khwam mankhng
læw rea k ca tadsen chiwit hı khad pi cak khea
dangnan ca mimi phu dı nı hmu phwk cea pen phu khumkan khea di
læa thæ cring xalkurxan nan pen khx teuxnsti kæ brrda phu yakerng
Læa thæcring rea ru xyang nænxn wa mi brrda phu pti sethxalkurxan nı hmu phwk cea
læa thæ cring xalkurxan nan penkar sera sok seiycı kæ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa
læa thæ cring xalkurxan nan khux khwam cring xan theiyngthæ nænxn
dangnan cea cng hı khwam brisuththi dwy phranam hæng phracea phu ying hıy
mi khn hnung di khx kar lngthosʹ thi ca txng keid khun xyang nænxn
sahrab brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nan mimi phu pad pxng dı «hı phn ca kar lngthosʹ pi di
(kar lngthosʹ nan) ma ca kxallxhˌ phu pen ceakhxng hæng thang khun su beuxng sung
ma la xik ahˌ læa xar ruhˌ (yib ril) ca khun pi ha phraxngkh nı wan hnung sung kahnd khxng man theakab ha hmun pi (khxng lok dun ya ni)
dangnan cea cng xdthn dwy khwam xdthn thi di ngam theid
thæcring phwk khea (mu chrikin)mxng hen kar lngthosʹ wa pen reuxng hang kil
tæwa rea hen man (kar lngthosʹ) nan pen reuxng kıl
wan thi thxngfa ca pen chen thxngdæng thi hlxmlalay
læa brrda phukhea ca pen chen khnsatw thi pliw wxn
læa mitrshay ca mi tham thungkan
thung mæwa phwk khea ca prasan sayta sung kanlæakan ktam phu praphvti chaw k khır ca thi tn hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ khx ngxallxhˌ nı wan nan dwy butr hlan khxng khea
læa dwy phriya khxng khea læa dwy phinxng khxng khea
læa dwy yati phinxng khxng khea sung di hı thiphak xasay kæ khea
læa dwy phu thi xyu nı phændin thangmwl pheux thi ca hı khea rxdphn cak kar lngthosʹ
mi ley thideiyw thæcring man pen fi nrk thi luk son
hnang sirsʹa thuk lxk xxk (pheraa khwam rxn khxng fi nrk)
man ca reiyk phu thi phin hlang læa han hang cak khwam cring
læa sasm thraphysin læa pidbang wi
thæcring mnusʹy nan thuk bangkeid ma pen khn hwanhiw
meux khwam thukkh yak prasb kæ khea k tiphoytiphay kladklum
læa meux khun khwam di prasb kæ khea k hwnghæn
nxkcak brrda phu kratha lahmad
brrda phu thi darng man xyu nı kar tha lahmad khxng phwk khea pen praca
Læa brrda phu thi nı thraphysin khxng phwk khea mi swn thi thuk kahnd wi
sahrab phu thi xey khx læa phu thi mi xey khx
læa brrda phu thi cheux man tx wan hæng kar txbthæn (wan ki ya mahˌ)
læa brrda phu thi mi khwam hwadhwan tx kar lngthosʹ hæng phracea khxng phwk khea
thæcring kar lngthosʹ hæng phracea khxng phwk khea mi pen thi plxdphay
læa brrda phu thi rawang raksʹa thwar khxng phwk khea
nxkcak kæ khukhrxng khxng phwk khea hrux thi muxkhwa khxng phwk khea khrxbkhrxng nı laksʹna chen nan phwk khea ca mi pen phu thi thuk tahni
dangnan phu dı lwng lameid nxkhenux pi cak nan chn hela nan phwk khea pen phu lameid
læa brrda phu thi rawang raksʹa sing thi di rab mxbhmay (xa ma nahˌ) khxng phwk khea læa khaman sayya khxng phwk khea
læa brrda phu thi darng man tx kar pen phyan khxng phwk khea
læa brrda phu thi darng raksʹa nı kar lahmad khxng phwk khea
chn hela nan ca xyu nı swn swrrkh xan hlakhlay pen phu di rab keiyrti
mi xari keid khun kæ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa thi wing krahudkrahxb mayang cea (muhammad)
phwk khea nang penk lum «thang khwa hrux thang say khxng cea
tæla khnnı hmu phwk khea tang k xyak ca kheapi xyu nı swn swrrkh xan sukh saray kranan hrux
mi ley thideiyw thæcring rea di srang phwk khea cak sing thi phwk khea ru kan di
kha khx saban tx phracea hæng brrda this tawanxxk læa brrda this tawantkwa thæcring rea (xallxhˌ) pen phu dechanuphaph xyang nænxn
tx kar thi rea ca peliyn tawthæn sung di kwa phwk khea læa rea ca mi pen phu hmd khwam samarth
dangnan cea cng plxy phwk khea hı mawsum læa hlng rareing cnkwa phwk khea ca di phb kab wan (ki ya mahˌ) khxng phwk khea sung phwk khea thuk sayya wi
wan thi phwk khea ca xxk ma cak hlum fang sph xyang rib reng khlay kab phwk khea wing kru pi yang cewd khxng phwk khea
sayta khxng phwk khea lahxy sera sld khwam xapys pkkhlum phwk khea nan khux wan thi phwk khea thuk sayya wi
Thæcring rea di sng nuhˌ pi yang hmu chn khxng khea (doy baycha wa) cea cng klaw takteuxn hmu chn khxng cea kxn thi kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd ca ma thung phwk khea
khea klaw wa xo hmu chn khxng chan xey! Thæcring chan khux phu takteuxn xan chad cæng khxng phwk than
phwk than cng khea rph phakdi xallxhˌ theid læa cng yakerng phraxngkh læa cng cheuxfang ptibati tam chan

phraxngkh ca thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk than nı khwam phid khxng phwk than læa ca thrng phxnphan phwk than cnkrathang thung wara thi thuk kahnd wi thæcring wara khx ngxallxhˌ nan meux ma thung læw man ca mi yud wela tx pi xik hak phwk than di ru
khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh thæcring kha phraxngkh di reiyk rxng cheiy chwn hmu chn khxng kha phraxngkh thang klangkhun læa klangwan
tæ kar reiyk rxng cheiy chwn khxng kha phraxngkh midi pheimphun sing dı kæ khea nxkcak kar hlb hni

læa thæcring thuk khrang thi kha phraxngkh reiyk rxng cheiy chwn phwk khea pheux thi phraxngkh than ca di xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk khea phwk khea k xea niw mux xud ru hu khxng phwk khea læa xea seuxpha khxng phwk khea khlumpong læa phwk khea yang dux ran læa hying ya sod wy khwam cxnghxng
khran læw kha phraxngkh di reiyk rxng cheiy chwn phwk khea xyang peidphey
læw kha phraxngkh kdi prakas kæ phwk khea xyang peidphey xik thang kha phraxngkh yang di bxkklaw kæ phwk khea xyang lab «xik dwy

phraxngkh ca thrng hlang na fn xyang makmay kæ phwk than
læa phraxngkh ca thrng pheimphun thraphysin læa luk hlan kæ phwk than læa ca thrng thahı mi swn mak hlay kæ phwk than læa ca thrng thahı mi lana mak hlay kæ phwk than
thami phwk than cung mi sanuk thung khwam ying hıy khx ngxallxhˌ
læa doy nænxn phraxngkh thrng srang phwk than tam ladab khan txn

Læa thrng thahı dwng canthr nı chan fa hela nan mi sængswang læa thrng thahı dwng xathity mi sæng ca

nuhˌ di klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh thæcring phwk khea di fafun kha phraxngkh læa cheuxfang phu thi thraphysin khxng khea læa luk hlan khxng khea midi pheimphun xan dı kæ khea nxkcak kar khadthun

læa phwk khea di klaw wa phwk than xya di thxdthing phracea thanghlay khxng phwk than penxankhad phwk than xya di thxdthing wad dˌ læa su waxˌ læa yakhusʹ læa ya xuk læa nasrˌ penxankhad
læa doy nænxn phwk khea di thahı hmu chn canwn mak hlng dangnan khx phraxngkh than xya di pheim xan dı kæ phwk xthrrm hela nan nxk ca kk kar hlng phid theanan
xan neuxng ma cak khwam phid mak hlay khxng phwk khea phwk khea cung thuk cm natay læa ca thuk hı khea xyu nı fi nrk dangnan phwk khea ca mi di phb phu chwyhelux sahrab phwk khea xun ca kxallxhˌ
læa nuhˌ di klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng xya plxy hı phwk ptiseth sraththa hlnghelux xyu nı phændin ni ley

pheraa thæcring hak phraxngkh thrng plxy hı phwk khea hlnghelux xyu phwk khea k ca thahı pwng baw khxng phraxngkh hlng phid læa phwk khea nan na hı kaneid tæ phwk lew thram phwk ptiseth sraththa theanan

kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ kha phraxngkh læa phx mæ khxng kha phraxngkh læa phu thi khea ma nı ban khxng kha phraxngkh pen phu sraththa læa brrda phu sraththa chay læa brrda phu sraththa hying læa phraxngkh than xya di pheim xan dı kæ phwk xthrrm hela nan nxkcak khwam phinas hayna theanan
Cng klaw theid muhammad wa di mi wa hiyˌ mayang chan wa thæ cring phwk yin canwn hnung di fang chan (xan ku rxan) læa phwk khea klaw wa thæcring rea diyin ku rxa nthi pælk prahlad
na pi su thang thi thuk txng dangnan phwk rea cung sraththa tx xalkurxan nan læa rea ca mi tang sing dı pen phakhi tx phracea khxng rea
læa khwam cring nan khwam ying hıy hæng phracea khxng rea nan thrng sungsng ying phraxngkh mimi phriya læa mimi butr
læa thæcring khn ngo nı hmu phwk rea di klaw ray tx xallxhˌ xyang kein hetu
læa thæcring rea khad khid wa mnusʹy læa yin ca mi klaw thec tx xallxhˌ penxankhad
læa thæcring mnusʹy bang khn khey khx khwam khum khrxng cak yi nbang khn dangnan phwk khea (mnusʹy) cung thahı phwk khea (yin)pheim kar hying cxnghxng ying khun
læa thæcring phwk khea (mnusʹy) khad khid chen deiyw kab thi phwk than (yin) khad khid wa xallxhˌ ca mi thrng tængtang phu dı khun (pen rx sul)

læa thæcring rea khey nang n sthan thinang nı thxngfa nan pheux fang tæ khna ni phu dı nang fang khea k ca phb pelw pheling thuk teriym wi sahrab khea
læa thæcring rea miru dxk wa khwam chaw ray nan ca thuk hı mi khun kæ phu thi xyu nı phændin ni hrux wa phracea khxng phwk khea prarthna næwthang thi thuk txng kæ phwk khea
læa thæcring nı hmu phwk rea nan mi khn di læa nı hmu phwk rea k mi khn xun cak nan phwk rea xyu nı næwthang thi tæk tang kan
læa thæcring rea khad khid wa rea ca mi rxdphn cak (kar lngthosʹ) khx ngxallxhˌ nı phændin ni læa rea ca hni mi rxdphn pi cak phraxngkh
læa thæcring meux rea di yin xalkurxan rea k sraththa tx xalkurxan nan dangnan phu dı sraththa tx phracea khxng khea khea k ca mi hwan kerng tx kar khadthun læa ka rx yutithrrm
Læa thæcring nı hmu phwk rea mi phu thi pen muslim læa nı hmu phwk rea mi phu xthrrm dangnan phu dı nxbnxm chn hela nan phwk khea di mung su næwthang thi thuk txng
læa swn brrda phu thi han hang xxk cak khwam cring phwk khea k pen fun khxng fi nrk

pheux rea ca thdsxb phwk khea nı reuxng ni læa phu dı han hang cak kar raluk thung phracea khxng khea phraxngkh ca hı khea di rab kar lngthosʹ xan sæn sahas
læa wa thæcring brrda masyid nan pen khx ngxallxhˌ dangnan phwk cea xya wingwxn khx phu dı kheiyng khu kab xallxhˌ
læa wa thæcring meux baw khx ngxallxhˌ (muhammad) yun khun klaw wingwxn khx tx phraxngkh phwk khea (yin) kdi hxmlxm khea xyang hnanæn
cng klaw theid muhammad wa thæcring chan wingwxn khx tx phracea khxng chan læa chan ca mi tang phu dı pen phakhi tx phraxngkh
cng klaw theid muhammad wa thæcring chan mimi xanac thi ca hı thosʹ læa hı khun kæ phwk than
cng klaw theid muhammad wa mimi phu dı ca khumkhrxng chan hı phn cak (kar lngthosʹ khxng) xallxhˌ di læa chan ca mi phb thiphung xan dı xun cak phraxngkh ley

cnkrathang meux phwk khea di hen sing thi phwk khea thuk sayya wi læw phwk khea k ca di ru wa khır pen phu xxnxæ ying nı kar pen phu chwyhelux læa mi canwn nxy kwa
cng klaw theid muhammad chan miru sing thi phwk than thuk sayya wi nan hrux wa phracea khxng chan ca thrng kahnd wela kar lngthosʹ nan hı hang kil xxk pi

Nxkcak phu thi phraxngkh thrng yindi chen rx sul dangnan phraxngkh ca thrng sng phu phithaksʹ fea dulæ khang hna læa khang hlang khea
